doc:
David Suchet https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/David_Suchet 0 David Suchet, ( SOO-shay; born 2 May 1946) is an English actor, known for his work on British stage and television. He played Edward Teller in the TV serial Oppenheimer and received the RTS and BPG awards for his performance as Augustus Melmotte in the 2001 British serial The Way We Live Now. He earned international recognition and acclaim for his performance as Agatha Christie's detective Hercule Poirot in Agatha Christie's Poirot, for which he received a 1991 British Academy of Film and Television Arts (BAFTA) nomination. David_Suchet , ( SOO-shay ; born_2_May_1946 ) is an_English_actor , known for his_work on British_stage_and_television . He played Edward_Teller in the_TV_serial_Oppenheimer and received the_RTS_and_BPG_awards for his_performance as Augustus_Melmotte in the_2001_British_serial The_Way We Live Now . He earned international_recognition_and_acclaim for his_performance as Agatha_Christie 's_detective_Hercule_Poirot in Agatha_Christie 's_Poirot , for which he received a_1991_British_Academy of Film_and_Television_Arts ( BAFTA_)_nomination .
